statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); short_dir=$(basename "$current_dir"); git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then git_info=" on $git_branch"; else git_info=''; fi; printf "\033[2m%s \033[0;36m%s\033[2m%s │ %s │ %s\033[0m" "$(whoami)" "$short_dir" "$git_info" "$model" "$style"
